title: How Raven Brought Light to the World
description: In this story which is both a bird tale AND a trickster tale, The Raven uses his magical powers to pull a trick and get hold of something he wants. But, does he get it all his own way? Listen to Tiernan Douieb telling this traditional story from the Haida people to find out.
itunes:title: How Raven Brought Light to the World
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
